appName: Frozen In Fear VR Early Access
displayName: Frozen In Fear VR Early Access
display_name: Frozen In Fear VR Early Access
display_long_description:
From DreamForgeEntertainment, the team behind the mobile hit Level UP: Fitness, comes a chilling new VR experience, so grab your friends.

Frozen In Fear is a multiplayer horror survival game where stationary humanoid objects—like mannequins and statues—become deadly once possessed. But there's a catch: they can only move when you're not looking. This unique mechanic demands teamwork, strategy, and constant vigilance. No two playthroughs will ever be the same.

Launching in Early Access, Frozen In Fear will evolve based on player feedback, with regular updates introducing new levels, gameplay features, items, and quality-of-life improvements.

The initial release features one playable level: the eerie Fashion Studio. Face the terror alone, or bring friends—just remember, sticking together might be your only chance of survival. The possessed are relentless, creeping silently until it’s too late…

Join the community on Discord for updates, challenges, new reveals, and to connect with other survivors:
👉 discord.gg/U3uzv8AbDP
